Interface IFavoriteFilmController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FavoriteFilmController

    public interface IFavoriteFilmController
    Interface that define FavoriteFilmController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteFavorite(java.lang.Integer filmCode)
      Returns a boolean that say if the selected film is not anymore one of the favorite films of the current customer.
